notes: Low fps in game even with low settings (~15 fps)! When in Menu/HUD cursor does sometimes disapear, fixed by closing and opening HUD again. With normal setting I had ~3fps, then it is not playable at all.
title: The Bard's Tale IV: Barrows Deep

notes: Game has very low fps even on lowest settings. Can hang when starting a New Game.
title: The Bard's Tale IV: Barrows Deep

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Game works without Proton related problems. Performance is abysmal for a game that looks like Oblivion but it's the same on Windows. 1440p, medium preset with ultra textures and increased draw distance -> 35-58 fps, slideshow when shaders are compiling. Patch 1, 3+ hours of gameplay. Would be platinum but automatic detection of graphical settings produces settings that have to be tweaked to get playable framerates so gold it is then.
title: The Bard's Tale IV: Barrows Deep

notes: When starting a new game and entering Skara Brae Below for the first time, I get a black screen. Pressing the space bar will resume the game. I assume it is attempting to play a cut scene but hanging. Otherwise graphics performance is a little slower than I would have expected, but the game is playable. About 3 hours into the game and have successfully completed a few missions.
title: The Bard's Tale IV: Barrows Deep
